verses.verse: Not unto us, O YY <WH3068>, not unto us, but unto thy name <WH8034> give <WH5414> <WH8798> glory <WH3519>, for thy mercy <WH2617>, and for thy truth's <WH571> sake.
Wherefore should the heathen <WH1471> say <WH559> <WH8799>, Where is now their 'Elohim <WH430> ?
But our 'Elohim <WH430> is in the heavens <WH8064>: he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> whatsoever he hath pleased <WH2654> <WH8804>.
Their idols <WH6091> are silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, the work <WH4639> of men's <WH120> hands <WH3027>.
They have mouths <WH6310>, but they speak <WH1696> <WH8762> not: eyes <WH5869> have they, but they see <WH7200> <WH8799> not:
They have ears <WH241>, but they hear <WH8085> <WH8799> not: noses <WH639> have they, but they smell <WH7306> <WH8686> not:
They have hands <WH3027>, but they handle <WH4184> <WH8686> not: feet <WH7272> have they, but they walk <WH1980> <WH8762> not: neither speak <WH1897> <WH8799> they through their throat <WH1627>.
They that make <WH6213> <WH8802> them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth <WH982> <WH8802> in them.
O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, trust <WH982> <WH8798> thou in the YY <WH3068>: he is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.
O house <WH1004> of Aharon <WH175>, trust <WH982> <WH8798> in the YY <WH3068>: he is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.
Ye that fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>, trust <WH982> <WH8798> in the YY <WH3068>: he is their help <WH5828> and their shield <WH4043>.

The YY <WH3068> hath been mindful <WH2142> <WH8804> of us: he will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> us; he will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; he will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the house <WH1004> of Aharon <WH175>.
He will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> them that fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>, both small <WH6996> and great <WH1419>.
The YY <WH3068> shall increase <WH3254> <WH8686> you more and more, you and your children <WH1121>.
Ye are blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068> which made <WH6213> <WH8802> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>.
The heaven <WH8064>, even the heavens <WH8064>, are the YY'S <WH3068>: but the earth <WH776> hath he given <WH5414> <WH8804> to the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>.
The dead <WH4191> <WH8801> praise <WH1984> <WH8762> not the YY <WH3050>, neither any that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> into silence <WH1745>.
But we will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the YY <WH3050> from this time forth and for <WH5704> evermore <WH5769>. Praise <WH1984> <WH8761> the YY <WH3050>.
